TopicTitle: Is it possible to edit explosion size? If so how?

Articles.Content:
I was just playing around when I thought it would be interesting to edit a part to make its blast size close to a nuclear weapon.

First of all is it possible and if so how? Thanks in Advance
Not the stock explosions. You might be able to mod explosion size of a bomb with BDArmory, though.

There is a mod called Blast Awesomeness Modifier that does this. It modify the hidden(?) blast awesomeness stat of stock parts, and you can choose how much blast awesomeness a thing can have.

But I don't think we will have a nuclear explosion anytime soon.
